oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Uncle Bob Gary's Place, circa 1930
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of a filling station called Uncle Bob Gary's Place on Trinity Lane and Dickerson Pike in Nashville, Tennessee. Advertisements for automotive oil and Coco-Cola products are posted outside of the store. A chalkboard with a hand-written advertisement for barbecue sandwiches is visible in the bottom right corner of the photograph. A man who is presumably Uncle Bob Gary stands in front of the filling station, posing for the picture. Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : b & w ; 9 x 11 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Gary, Bob
